√yuj 'join'

present: [7.] yunákti  yuṅkté etc. V.+  yunaṅkṣi?  yuñjīyāt   -- yuñjati  yuñjate etc.   -- [2.] yujé  yujmahe  yujata (3p.)  yukṣvá  

perfect: yuyója  yuyujé etc. V.+  yuyujma  yuyujré  niniyoja  yuyójate  

aorist: [1.] áyuji etc.  yojate  yujāná  yojam etc.  áyoji   -- [2.] yujanta  ayujat  ayujanta   -- [3.] ayūyujat etc. E.+   -- [4.] ayokṣīt  ayaukṣīt  ayukṣi etc. V.+  ayuṅkṣmahi  

future: [1.] yokṣyati etc. B.+  yokṣyate etc. AV.+   -- [2.] yoktā́  

verbal: yuktá V.+  yoktum B.+  yuktvā́ V.+  yuktvā́ya  -yujya E.+  yujé  

secondary: passive: yujyáte etc. V.+  yujyáti etc. E.+   -- intensive: yoyuj-   -- desiderative: yuyukṣati etc. E.+   -- causative: yojayati etc. E.+  yojayate etc. E.+  yojyate etc.  

derivatives: yúj V.+  -yuja V.S.  yújya V.B.  yugá V.+  yugya E.+  -yuṅga B.  yuñjaka E.+  yóga V.+  yógya AV.+  yogyā́ RV.  yogin S.+  yojaka E.  yojya E.+  yójana V.+  yojanīya C.  yukti V.+  yoktavyà B.+  yoktṛ́ B.+  yóktra V.+  yojitṛ C.  yugma S.+  yugmán B.  -yúgvan V.B.S.  yuyukṣu C.  yojayitavya C.  yojayitṛ S.C.
